titleInfo.title: United States of America v. Kindhearts for Charitable Humanitarian Development, 3450 West Central Avenue, Suite 366, Toledo, Ohio
titleInfo.subTitle: Order : The motion to vacate, or, in the alternative, to modify amended protective order [Doc. 25] is granted. The government shall forthwith commence producing copies at its expense of all seized materials to counsel of record for KindHearts, and as well, as provided herein, to such representatives of KindHearts as counsel shall designate. A telephonic status/scheduling conference shall be held in this case and Case No. 3:08CV2400, on February 9, 2009, at 4:30 p.m. before the undersigned; prior to said conference the parties shall file status reports/agendas on February 6, 2009. 16. Judge James G. Carr on 1/30/2009. (S,AL)

extension.docketText: Order : The motion to vacate, or, in the alternative, to modify amended protective order [Doc. 25] is granted. The government shall forthwith commence producing copies at its expense of all seized materials to counsel of record for KindHearts, and as well, as provided herein, to such representatives of KindHearts as counsel shall designate. A telephonic status/scheduling conference shall be held in this case and Case No. 3:08CV2400, on February 9, 2009, at 4:30 p.m. before the undersigned; prior to said conference the parties shall file status reports/agendas on February 6, 2009. 16. Judge James G. Carr on 1/30/2009. (S,AL)
